author: costin
msg: First step to a new directory structure.
Changed build.xml and fixed various files

author: costin
msg: Moved Catalina interfaces from tomcat to tomcat/catalina.
Those interfaces are used by various catalina modules, and having them in
tomcat will enable easy re-integration of the revolution and code exchange
between catalina and the main branch.
The files are moved from org.apache.tomcat package to avoid confusions and
reduce "polution" - we already have too much in tomcat, many "legacy"

author: costin
msg: Temp. removed ApacheConf - it brakes watchdog.

author: costin
msg: ApacheConfig will generate Apache configuration file - it can be called
from a deploytool or from ContextManager, after all contexts are set up.
